description: Try our easy to follow Sesame & Ginger Chicken Poke Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Poke bowl,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sesame & Ginger Chicken Poke Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g chicken breasts, trimmed of fat, chopped into cubes
4 tbs sesame seeds, chopped into matchsticks
4 medium spring onions, sliced into matchsticks

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice according to pack instructions, drain and set aside. Bring a pan of water to the boil and cook the edamame for 5 minutes. Drain and set aside.

Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high. Toss the chicken cubes in the sesame seeds in a large bowl to coat evenly. Add the chicken to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side or until completely cooked through and crispy on the outside. Set aside.
Whisk the soy sauce, vinegar, ginger and toasted sesame oil together in a medium bowl.
Toss the vegetables in half the dressing in a large bowl.
Divide the rice between 4 bowls, add the vegetable mix and chicken, drizzle over the remaining dressing and serve.
